docs.snippet: After Russian President Vladimir Putin and national judo team coach Ezio Gamba took each other to the mat in a practice, Putin followed up with a smooth move — granting the Italian a Russian passport....
docs.lead_paragraph: After Russian President Vladimir Putin and national judo team coach Ezio Gamba took each other to the mat in a practice, Putin followed up with a smooth move — granting the Italian a Russian passport.

headline.main: Putin Grants Italian Judo Coach Citizenship
headline.print_headline: Putin Grants Italian Judo Coach Citizenship

docs.snippet: An attack by Islamic State militants on a military base in northern Iraq shows Turkey's decision to deploy troops there was justified, Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An attack by Islamic State militants on a military base in northern Iraq shows Turkey's decision to deploy troops there was justified, Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan said on Friday.

headline.main: Attack on Iraqi Military Base Justifies Turkish Deployment: Erdogan
headline.print_headline: Attack on Iraqi Military Base Justifies Turkish Deployment: Erdogan

docs.snippet: As a Saudi-Iran crisis roils the Middle East, the U.N. special envoy to Syria arrived in Damascus on Friday to lay the groundwork and prepare the peace negotiations between President Bashar Assad's government and its opponents due later this month...
docs.lead_paragraph: As a Saudi-Iran crisis roils the Middle East, the U.N. special envoy to Syria arrived in Damascus on Friday to lay the groundwork and prepare the peace negotiations between President Bashar Assad's government and its opponents due later this month in Geneva.

headline.main: UN Envoy in Syria to Assure Upcoming Peace Talks in Geneva
headline.print_headline: UN Envoy in Syria to Assure Upcoming Peace Talks in Geneva

docs.snippet: An attempted attack by Islamic State on a military base in northern Iraq shows Turkey's decision to deploy troops there was justified, President Tayyip Erdogan said on Friday, suggesting Russia was stirring up a row over the issue....
docs.lead_paragraph: An attempted attack by Islamic State on a military base in northern Iraq shows Turkey's decision to deploy troops there was justified, President Tayyip Erdogan said on Friday, suggesting Russia was stirring up a row over the issue.

headline.main: Erdogan Says Attempted Islamic State Attack Vindicates Iraq Deployment
headline.print_headline: Erdogan Says Attempted Islamic State Attack Vindicates Iraq Deployment

docs.snippet: Finland said on Friday it would extradite a Russian citizen accused of computer fraud and abuse to the United States for trial....
docs.lead_paragraph: Finland said on Friday it would extradite a Russian citizen accused of computer fraud and abuse to the United States for trial.

headline.main: Finland Extradites Russian Computer Fraud Suspect to U.S.
headline.print_headline: Finland Extradites Russian Computer Fraud Suspect to U.S.

docs.snippet: German automaker Volkswagen says its global sales fell 2 percent last year as it struggled with a scandal over cars it had rigged to evade diesel emissions tests in the U.S....
docs.lead_paragraph: German automaker Volkswagen says its global sales fell 2 percent last year as it struggled with a scandal over cars it had rigged to evade diesel emissions tests in the U.S.

headline.main: Scandal-Hit Volkswagen Sees Sales Fall 2 Percent in 2015
headline.print_headline: Scandal-Hit Volkswagen Sees Sales Fall 2 Percent in 2015

docs.snippet: The European Union on Friday welcomed Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's decision to allow humanitarian access to the town of Madaya, and called for a halt to all attacks on civilians in the conflict, ahead of peace talks later this month....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Union on Friday welcomed Syrian President Bashar al-Assad's decision to allow humanitarian access to the town of Madaya, and called for a halt to all attacks on civilians in the conflict, ahead of peace talks later this month.

headline.main: EU Welcomes Access to Syria's Madaya, Urges Halt to Attacks on Civilians
headline.print_headline: EU Welcomes Access to Syria's Madaya, Urges Halt to Attacks on Civilians

docs.snippet: Readers call for enactment of the Comprehensive Nuclear Test Ban Treaty and a return of the 1954 Geneva Conference on Korea....
docs.lead_paragraph: Readers call for enactment of the Comprehensive Nuclear Test Ban Treaty and a return of the 1954 Geneva Conference on Korea.

docs.snippet: A dummy U.S. Hellfire missile was mistakenly shipped from Europe to Cuba in 2014, The Wall Street Journal reported Thursday....
